meanings.sent1: The crackbrained man talked to invisible friends.
meanings.sent2: She thought the idea was crackbrained.
meanings.sent3: The crackbrained squirrel tried to water ski.
meanings.sent4: His crackbrained theories floated like balloons in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The crackbrained notion of flying without wings amazed everyone.

meanings.definition: Characterized by foolish or nonsensical behavior
meanings.sent1: Her crackbrained decision to wear flip-flops in the snow surprised us.
meanings.sent2: The crackbrained plan to build a house of cards failed miserably.
meanings.sent3: The crackbrained cat chased its own tail for hours.
meanings.sent4: Their crackbrained scheme to catch the moon with a net was amusing.
meanings.sent5: The crackbrained idea of using a fork to eat soup made everyone chuckle.
